channel.title: Music Information Research MIR on Philosophy of Games
channel.description: Recent content in Music Information Research MIR on Philosophy of Games

item.title: Huang Et Al Beyond Data
item.description: Christian Hip-Hop and Moral Priviledge # Narrative thinking is substantial in our lives as it provides ways of thinking about how our lives may have gone differently, our plans for the future, and how things might turn out (non-actual episodes). Considering Christian Hip-Hop, I argue that such considerations are an important factor when determining ethical principles on which to develop artificially intelligent music curation services. This is because Christian Hip-Hop undermines the standard narrative commonly associated with lower socio-economic communities.
